entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
